snippet.title: Archmage Rises Gameplay - Mage Tower Update - No Commentary
snippet.description:
In this video, we wanted to show off some of the core gameplay of the video as of the recent Mage Tower release.

About Archmage Rises:
Experience the freedom of a tabletop RPG in a rogue-like video game. Born into a procedurally generated world and armed with ancient, primal magic, you will create your own story and experience real consequences from the decisions you make. Will you be the world’s savior . . . or its destroyer? The choice is yours. Join us on Steam Early Access as we develop one of the most ambitious RPG video games of our time.

Get the Archmage Rises Game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/506480/Archmage_Rises/

Get the Archmage Rises Soundtrack here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2537400/Archmage_Rises_Soundtrack/

Or you can buy them together as a bundle!

Do you play Archmage Rises? Contribute to our official wiki at https://archmageriseswiki.com
Join our Discord Server: https://discord.gg/DUE2NYPrcQ
